title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Nov 18 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Nov 18 2021
description:
Media continues to cry "racism" in Rittenhouse trial. MSNBC's Joy Reid compares Kyle Rittenhouse’s ‘male white tears’ to Brett Kavanaugh’s. Identity politics and cancel culture are the twin pillars of Democratic Party. DeSantis trolls Biden, signs bill limiting vaccine mandates in Brandon, Florida. From response DeSantis got, Clay asks if there could be any better running mate for Trump in 2024 than DeSantis. Caller says we need DeSantis as a governor! How low can Biden's approval go? "Serious" newspaper Washington Post has "hard-hitting" story on how President Biden’s affection for cars is as much a part of him as his love for ice cream. Biden would never survive the same treatment Trump was given by the corporate media. The Conservative City Project: Clay and Buck ask provocative questions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
